title: Lohanipur
text:
Lohanipur is a village in <a href="Harchandpur">Harchandpur</a> block of <a href="Rae%20Bareli%20district">Rae Bareli district</a>, <a href="Uttar%20Pradesh">Uttar Pradesh</a>, <a href="India">India</a>. It is located 4 km from <a href="Raebareli">Raebareli</a>, the district headquarters. As of 2011, its population is 2,378, in 433 households.
The <a href="1961%20Census%20of%20India">1961 census</a> recorded Lohanipur as comprising 4 hamlets, with a total population of 859 people (434 male and 425 female), in 195 households and 162 physical houses. The area of the village was given as 293 <a href="acre">acre</a>s.
The <a href="1981%20Census%20of%20India">1981 census</a> recorded Lohanipur (as "Lohinipur") as having a population of 935, people, in 195 households, and having an area of 160.06 <a href="hectare">hectare</a>s. The main staple foods were given as wheat and gram.
